<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Find Transaction ID by Transition ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/find/transactionID/{transitionID}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the Transaction ID associated with a Transition ID.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"transitionID","in":"path","description":"The transition ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"The transactionID in which the transition is part of.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"result":{"type":"string"}},"title":"TransactionIdResponse"}}}},"404":{"description":"Transaction not found"},"500":{"description":"Server error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
